description: Main front-end source file for the Finance Tracker app, defining the app widget tree, navigation, and core screens such as login, dashboard, transactions, budgets, and charts.

classes.name: FinanceTrackerApp
classes.description: Root widget that establishes dark theme and navigation structure.

classes.name: AuthNavigation
classes.description: Handles route to authentication screens and main dashboard based on authentication state.

classes.name: MainScaffold
classes.description: Main application shell with bottom navigation for key sections.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: Placeholder login form with email/password and login logic.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: Placeholder registration form with email/password confirmation.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Displays recent transactions and links to add more.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: Displays list of transactions with add, edit, delete functionalities.

classes.name: TransactionEditScreen
classes.description: Form for creating or editing a transaction.

classes.name: BudgetsScreen
classes.description: Shows categorized budgets and their spent limits.

classes.name: ChartsScreen
classes.description: Displays analytic charts, including spending breakdowns.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes and runs the app.

methods.name: AuthNavigation.initState
methods.description: Checks authentication state on widget load.

methods.name: AuthNavigation._checkAuth
methods.description: Calls AuthService.isAuthenticated to determine login state.

methods.name: AuthNavigation._onAuthenticated
methods.description: Callback for successful login, updates state.

methods.name: AuthNavigation._onSwitchToLogin
methods.description: Switches UI back to login screen.

methods.name: AuthNavigation._onLogout
methods.description: Logs out user and resets to login UI.

methods.name: MainScaffold._onNavTapped
methods.description: Handles tab switching in bottom navigation.

methods.name: LoginScreen._handleLogin
methods.description: Attempts login via AuthService; handles success/failure.

methods.name: RegisterScreen._handleRegister
methods.description: Attempts registration via AuthService; handles success/failure.

methods.name: DashboardScreen._fetchRecent
methods.description: Loads recent transactions for dashboard view.

methods.name: TransactionEditScreen._save
methods.description: Saves new or edited transaction data.

methods.name: TransactionEditScreen._pickDate
methods.description: Displays date picker for transaction date.
